items.question: How long does it take to implement a solution?
items.answer: The timeline varies depending on the complexity of each project. My focus is on agility, but I always set realistic and transparent deadlines aligned with your needs.

items.question: How can Artificial Intelligence help my business?
items.answer: I use AI to automate tasks, personalize your customer experience, and extract insights from your data, generating greater efficiency and growth opportunities.

items.question: What type of businesses do you work with?
items.answer: My focus is on businesses (small and medium-sized) seeking to optimize their operations and gain efficiency through technology, regardless of the sector.

items.question: What is the investment for an Automation or AI solution?
items.answer: The cost depends on the specific solution. I work with personalized proposals, aiming to offer the best cost-effectiveness and a clear return on investment for your company.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge to hire your services?
items.answer: Not at all! My approach is to explain everything clearly and simply, focusing on the results for your business. You will have full visibility of the process, without technical jargon.
